data.text:
https://www.buzzsprout.com/61222/3179377-dogma.mp3

We continue with another episode of Season 4 of Flicks XRayed with episode 41 and this week we watch and review the View Askewiverse classic Dogma. The Host Tony is joined by Cohost and Hetero Life Mate Corey and guests Jason Mewes Joe, Stoner Prophet Natasha,and from the Bloke Busters Podcast Buddy Christ Paul. This week we play a game of Release Yer for Kevin Smith Movies, The Price is Right and The Flicks Awesome Lodge Word Game for the coveted princess crown. So tune in as we discuss at length about Kevin Smith, Organized Religion, Jay and Silent Bob and sooo much more.

Our Ratings

Buddy Christ Paul 4

Jason Mewes Joe 4

Stoner Prophet Natasha 4

Hetero Life Mate Corey 3.5

Host Tony 4

19.5/25 78%

Bloke Busters Podcast:

Website

Twitter

Synopsis and Starring

Synopsis: Two fallen angels who were ejected from paradise find themselves banned in Wisconsin. They are now headed for New Jersey where they find a loophole that can get them back into heaven. The only catch is that it will destroy humanity. A group bands together to stop them.

Directed by Kevin Smith

Starring

Linda Fiorentino as Bethany

Matt Damon as Loki

Ben Affleck as Bartleby

Alan Rickman as Metatron

Jason Lee as Azrael

Chris Rock as Rufus

Jason Mewes as Jay

Kevin Smith as Silent Bob

Game 1
